## ZCurve.decode() method

Decodes given Z index into point coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decode(z: bigint, out?: NumericArray): NumericArray;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  z | <code>bigint</code> | Z index |
|  out | <code>NumericArray</code> | optional result array |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NumericArray`
